p: Selmer Schonland Herbarium, Albany Museum Grahams town with Voucher No. BM01â€“040/2007 and the voucher specimen was deposited. Prior to essential oil extraction, plant material was rinsed with distilled water and shade dried on foil paper in the laboratory at ambient temperature for 6 days and thereafter, T. minuta flower was pulverized in a blending machine (Polymix PX-MFC90 D, Lasec/SA).
